figura.toast.reload_all: Se han recargado todos los avatares
figura.permissions.value.custom_render_l: Permitir el uso de capas de render personalizadas
figura.permissions.value.custom_sounds: Permitir el uso de sonidos personalizados
figura.permissions.value.custom_skull: Usar el Avatar para las cabezas de jugador
figura.badges.system.permissions: El Avatar requiere un nivel de permisos superior
figura.badges.system.warning: Avatar diseñado para una versión más reciente de Figura
figura.badges.system.error: Error de Script en el Avatar
figura.badges.special.discord_staff: Admin en el servidor de Discord de Figura
figura.badges.special.donator: Thank you for supporting the Figura mod!
figura.badges.no_permissions.init_inst: El Script supera el límite de recursos
figura.badges.no_permissions.bb_animatio: Las animaciones del modelo son demasiado complejas
figura.badges.no_permissions.custom_soun: Se requiere el uso de sonidos personalizados
figura.badges.no_permissions.vanilla_mod: El Avatar modifica el modelo predeterminado del jugador
figura.gui.name: Nombre
figura.gui.panic:
Modo seguro activado
Las funciones de Figura están desactivadas
Pulsa [%s] para desactivar
figura.gui.duplicate_keybind:
Esta tecla también se usa para:
%s
figura.gui.new_version.tooltip: Hay una versión de Figura más reciente: %s
figura.gui.text_hint.name: Nombre/UUID
figura.gui.error.no_sounds: Avatar does not have custom sounds!
figura.gui.error.no_wheel_page: Action Wheel has no active Page!
figura.gui.wardrobe.upload.tooltip:
Upload avatar to the Figura server
Other players will see you as the uploaded avatar
figura.gui.wardrobe.reload.tooltip: Reload avatar from the Figura server
figura.gui.wardrobe.delete.tooltip: Delete avatar from the Figura server
figura.gui.wardrobe.drop_files: Do you want to copy the following files to your wardrobe?
figura.gui.permissions.figura_only.toolt: Solo mostrar jugadores que usen Figura
figura.gui.status.script.2: Script hecho para una versión más reciente
figura.gui.avatar_wizard.name: Name
figura.config.self_nameplate.tooltip: Toggles the rendering of your own nameplate
figura.config.nameplate_render.tooltip: Toggles the conditions to render entities nameplates
figura.config.nameplate_render.enum:
Vanilla: Vanilla behaviour
Looking At: You must be looking at the entity for its nameplate to render
Never: Nameplate will never render
figura.config.preview_nameplate.tooltip: Toggles the rendering of nameplates in the GUI
figura.config.chat_nameplate.tooltip: Set the level of nameplate customizations on the CHAT
figura.config.entity_nameplate.tooltip: Set the level of nameplate customizations on the ENTITY
figura.config.list_nameplate.tooltip: Set the level of nameplate customizations on the TABLIST
figura.config.nameplate_level.enum:
None: No customizations will be applied
Script: Allows for script customizations
Badges: Allows the inclusion of special Badges provided by Figura
figura.config.log_location.tooltip: Dónde enviar los mensajes de depuración (función print de lua)
figura.config.log_location.enum:
Chat: El chat del juego(también se guarda en el registro)
Logger: El registro del cliente
figura.config.log_number_length.tooltip: Changes the length of the decimal places that will be displayed within print functions
figura.config.format_script: Nivel de minificación de los Scripts
figura.config.format_script.tooltip.1: Selects if scripts should be compacted, removing out comments, whitespaces and/or empty lines
figura.config.format_script.tooltip.2: Reselecciona el Avatar para que tenga efecto
figura.config.format_script.enum:
Desactivado: No hacer nada
Bajo: Elimina comentarios y espacios extra
Alto: Elimina comentarios, espacios extra y saltos de línea
figura.config.iris_compatibility_fix.too:
Ajustes para mejorar la compatibilidad con el mod Iris
No tiene efecto si Iris no está instalado
figura.config.iris_compatibility_fix.enu:
No: Don't apply any compatibility fix
Offset: Offset special render types a tiny bit, to make sure they're rendered on top of other render types
Emissives: When a shader pack is active, change the way the emissive render type work to a more compatible system that uses fully-lit textures instead of the vanilla eyes type
figura.config.allow_fp_hands.tooltip: Toggles if scripts can move around, rotate or scale the First Person Hand parent type groups
figura.config.render_debug_parts_pivot.t: Render the Pivots from %d and %d when the hitbox debug rendering is enabled
figura.config.render_debug_parts_pivot.e:
Off: Do not render pivots
Visible: Render only pivots of parts that are visible
Everything: Render all pivots of this Avatar
Host: Only render if the target Avatar is the Host
Everyone: Render in all Avatars
figura.config.first_person_matrices.tool: Toggles if the model part matrices should be updated while in first person
figura.config.action_wheel_button.toolti: Button to open the Action Wheel
figura.config.action_wheel_mode.tooltip: Changes the way to open and interact with the Action Wheel
figura.config.action_wheel_mode.enum:
Hold: The Action Wheel button must be kept pressed for the Action Wheel to show up
Toggle: The Action Wheel button must be pressed once for the Action Wheel to open, and pressed again for it to close
Run on Release: Executes the current selected Action when closing the Action Wheel
figura.config.action_wheel_title.tooltip: Changes where the place of the selected action's text is shown
figura.config.action_wheel_title.enum:
Tooltip: Render just like GUI tooltips
Mouse: Renders the text next to the mouse
Top: Renders the text above the Action Wheel
Middle: Renders the text in the middle of the Action Wheel
Bottom: Renders the text below the Action Wheel
figura.config.action_wheel_slots_indicat:
Changes the position of this Page's Slots Indicator text, which is based on the slots shown in the action wheel
If the Selected Action Text is set to the same position as this, the action text will take priority when rendering

Top: Renders the text above the Action Wheel
Middle: Renders the text in the middle of the Action Wheel
Bottom: Renders the text below the Action Wheel
figura.config.action_wheel_decorations.t: Toggle the rendering of the item decorations, like the damage bar and the item count
figura.config.background_scroll_speed.to: Multiplier for scroll speed of the animated background
figura.config.popup_scale.tooltip: Scale multiplier for the player popup
figura.config.popup_min_size.tooltip: Minimum size of player popup as you get farther from the person
figura.config.popup_max_size.tooltip: Maximum size of player popup as you get closer to the person
figura.config.avatar_portrait.tooltip: Toggles if the player lists should render a portrait of their avatar instead of the player skin
figura.config.figura_inventory.tooltip: Toggles between vanilla and Figura's paperdoll rendering for the player inventory
figura.config.toast_time.tooltip: Changes how much time (in seconds) the Figura toasts should be visible
figura.config.toast_title_time.tooltip: Changes how much time (in seconds) long toasts should show its title before changing to the message
figura.config.wardrobe_file_names.toolti: Changes the wardrobe avatar list to use the file names instead of the metadata (avatar.json) name
figura.config.preview_head_rotation.tool:
Toggles if the player head rotation should be applied in avatar previews through the GUI
When off, the avatar will always be rendered looking forwards
figura.config.text_scroll_speed.tooltip: Changes how fast the Text should scroll
figura.config.text_scroll_delay.tooltip: Changes the delay (in ticks) that the Text should wait before scrolling
figura.config.paperdoll_always_on.toolti: Toggle if the paperdoll should render always or only during poses
figura.config.first_person_paperdoll.too: Toggles if the paperdoll should render only when in first person
figura.config.paperdoll_invisible.toolti: Toggles if the paperdoll should remove the invisibility effect while rendering
figura.config.popup_button.tooltip: Button to open a popup menu with quick actions for the targeted user
figura.config.reload_button.tooltip: Reloads current equipped avatar on press
figura.config.panic_button.tooltip: Stop the rendering of all avatars
figura.config.button_location.enum:
Icon: Renders the Figura button as a small Icon next to the Player Reporting button
Other: Renders the Figura button as text, anchored at the given position
figura.config.update_channel.tooltip: Changes the version type when looking for new Figura updates
figura.config.update_channel.enum:
None: Do not check for updates
Releases: Check only for releases updates
Pre-releases: Check for pre-releases and releases updates
figura.config.default_permission_level.t: Changes the default Permission Level that new players will be assigned into
figura.config.chat_emojis.tooltip: Toggles the emoji parsing on chat messages, that converts ":emoji_name:" into emojis
figura.config.easter_eggs.tooltip: Toggles fun and unexpected aspects of Figura (boring!)
figura.config.connection_toasts.tooltip: Toggles if the game should show up toasts related with the backend connection status
figura.config.log_others.tooltip: Allows debug logging and errors of non-host scripts
figura.config.log_pings.tooltip: Chooses wherever to log pings data
figura.config.log_pings.enum:
Off: Do not log pings
Chat: The in-game chat (the chat also prints in the logger)
Logger: The output log of your client
figura.config.sync_pings.tooltip.1: Toggles if host pings should be executed locally or received from the backend
figura.config.sync_pings.tooltip.2: Note that: if toggled, your pings will never run if you're not connected to the backend!
figura.config.chat_messages.tooltip.1: Toggles if scripts can change and/or send chat messages for you
figura.config.chat_messages.tooltip.2: This is a dangerous option, as the chat messages will still be signed
figura.config.chat_messages.tooltip.3: Figura does not take any responsibility for the usage of this feature
figura.config.main_dir.tooltip: Changes the location of the Figura folder
figura.config.server_ip.tooltip: Sets the IP of the server used for Figura's multiplayer features
figura.config.clear_cache.tooltip:
Clears the cache files
Removes things like cached Avatars and UI states
Will not clear settings nor saved permissions
figura.config.redownload_assets.tooltip:
This button allows for redownloading the runtime assets (emojis, translation files, etc) from the backend
Normally the assets are downloaded only when the game launches
This process might hang the game for a while, since a resource reload is executed
figura.command.run.no_script_error: No active script to run code in!
figura.command.docs_export.success: Exported Figura docs into the Figura directory
figura.command.debug.success: Saved debug data into the Figura directory
